item.title: The Adventure Thus Far...
item.description: Backstory: # Down on his luck and without any prospects in Neverwinter, Kal Windrunner looked up a dwarf by the name of Gundrin Rockseeker for an escort job from Neverwinter to some woodtick down in the south called Phandalin. Gundrin also had hired an old drunk by the name of Pete and a halfling healer named Nib. In addition, a member of the Lord’s Alliance, Sildar Hallwinter would ride south with them as well.
